name: E.T Mixology
description:
After being abducted by space aliens, you've quickly run out of space creds and are trying to earn enough to buy a ticket back to Earth! Unfortunately, the only job you could find was at a space port bar. You don't know the language, but that can't stop you!

Instructions:

Interpret the alien language into drink orders! If you get the drink wrong, the bar's manager will float in and describe the served.
